entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is referred to as a student and the main character in the conversation. He is addressed by his last name 'Potter' and also called 'Harry'. (e.g. 'Your nickname,' repeated Snape; 'I think that you are a liar and a cheat and that you deserve detention with me every Saturday until the end of term, Potter?')

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is referred to as a teacher and the one who is giving Harry detentions. He has 'cold, black eyes' and is described as having a 'smile that showed his yellow teeth'. (e.g. 'The cold, black eyes were boring once more into Harry's; he tried not to look into them.')

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as a house in the conversation, specifically in relation to Quidditch. (e.g. 'Poor Gryffindor ... fourth place this year, I fear...')

relationships.description: Snape is giving Harry detentions every Saturday until the end of term. (e.g. 'I think that you are a liar and a cheat and that you deserve detention with me every Saturday until the end of term.')
Harry is receiving detentions from Snape. (e.g. 'Well, we shall see how you feel after your detentions...')
